1351920.name: Tabletopia - Zoom In Barcelona
1351920.description:
Only the host needs to own this DLC.

2-4 Players | Ages 7+

25-45 Minutes

About Game


Travel around the city of Barcelona and take the best photos to win the game!

In Zoom In Barcelona, players compete in a photo contest to try to take the best photos of the city. During the game you will take photos of its beautiful locations, the iconic structures that create the skyline of Barcelona, and… dragons!

Hop on a bike, catch a taxi or a bus to get to the best spots before the other players. Find the best views of the city, from its seashore to the mountains of Collserola and Montjuïc. Discover its incredible architecture, and the outstanding Modernist sites including those of visionary architect Gaudí.

Are you ready? Grab your camera and win the game!
